name: Write your Fantasy Weapon...
description:
'Write' your very own Fantasy Weapon!Adventure

Explore a little adventure story about finding your way through the paths of an ancient temple while defining your character traits based on your decisions...

Generator

Using the character you defined in the adventure part a weapon will be created:

  • Choose the aggresive way and get a powerful hammer
  • Choose the path of honor to receive a two-handed sword
  • ...
Export

At the end hit the 'Save Model'-Button to save your weapon (without materials) as a .obj file and do whatever you like with it :D
